title: Update branding to A B Digital Craft

requirements.text: Update the HTML document title from 'Digital Marketing' to 'A B Digital Craft' in frontend/index.html
acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab displays 'A B Digital Craft' as the page title
The title tag in index.html contains 'A B Digital Craft'

requirements.text: Replace the hero section headline to prominently feature 'A B Digital Craft' as the company name with the tagline 'Your Success Digital Partner', maintaining the existing layout and brand color styling
acceptanceCriteria: The hero headline displays 'A B Digital Craft' prominently
The tagline 'Your Success Digital Partner' is visible beneath or integrated with the headline
Existing gradient overlay and brand colors (coral/amber/teal) are preserved
Text remains readable against the background

requirements.text: Integrate the uploaded A B Digital Craft logo (featuring black 'A', purple 'B', and full branding lockup) into the website header or hero section as a static asset rendered from frontend/public/assets/generated/ab-digital-logo.png
acceptanceCriteria: The A B Digital Craft logo with the black 'A', purple 'B', and full text lockup is visible on the page
Logo is rendered as an image from the static assets directory
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and quality
Logo placement complements the existing layout without disrupting other sections

requirements.text: Update the Footer component to display 'A B Digital Craft' as the copyright holder instead of a generic name, maintaining the existing copyright year and caffeine.ai attribution
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays 'Â© [current year] A B Digital Craft. All rights reserved.' or similar

constraints: Do not modify the backend/main.mo file
Preserve the existing color scheme (coral/amber/teal) and visual theme

required: A B Digital Craft logo with black 'A', purple 'B' interlocking design, 'DIGITAL CRAFT' text in purple, and tagline 'YOUR SUCCESS DIGITAL PARTNER' in gray, optimized for web header display (ab-digital-logo.dim_800x600.png)
